subject: AW: A shipment from order #SSN3340 is on the way
description_text:
Good Evening,

I received the package today but unfortunately there were only the pedals in the package.

The Haptic Motors are missing.

Is there another package arriving in the next days or what happened here?

Best Regards
Florian Zelisko
